editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task manager – and this Apple Design Award winner is adaptable enough for anyone. Organising items is as simple as dragging them where you want them, and the Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app.

editorialNotes.tagline: Keep it close to the tarmac

name: Loco Pets: Fox & Cat co op

ios.subtitle: Guess the word with video chat

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: If they see you coming, it’s too late! Your mind is still your best weapon in the updated version of this sneaky 2006 action game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALL·E directed by Tim Burton—that’s the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robot’s quest for love combines tons more influences—like point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic books—for a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome “aha!” moments, it’s an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

We haven’t seen hoverboarding this cool since the Back to the Future flicks. Oddrok’s fantastic action game lets you grind rails and shoot through half-pipes in levels stuffed with surprises. Rival boarders drop bombs in your path; towering sandworms and lethal lasers dare you to come near. The whole time, an energetic soundtrack and swooping camera give Power Hover an exhilarating, cinematic feel that’s like pure adrenaline.
The latest in this gorgeous, long-running tower defence series adds cool twists, like playing with two heroes at once.

name: 真大闹天宫 西游录

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Revenge is a dish served with epic property damage and plenty of attitude when a princess and her pet dragon decide they’re tired of getting captured. It’s pure destructive joy guiding this royal duo over (and under) a gorgeous fantasy landscape of fleeing knights, treacherous traps, and mighty bosses to smash. The game pops with personality—and its simple controls, slick level design, and upgradable equipment keep the challenge fun and fresh.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Classics never go out of style

editorialNotes.short: A chilling experience that's super rewarding.
editorialNotes.standard: Now here’s how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this series—its chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visuals—while making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: One team, one dream. But a massive number of tyre options.

editorialNotes.standard: What’s made OLO game one of our longtime multiplayer favourites? The way it perfectly captures the friendly fun of real-world shuffleboard and air hockey. Virtually anyone can jump into a match (locally or online) and have an amazing time flicking discs into the target zone for points—and slyly knocking an opponent’s discs away to lower their score. Elegant and irresistible, Sennep’s all-ages masterpiece lets up to four players enjoy games that can be as casual or hardcore as everyone wants them to be.

name: Fury Unleashed
artistName: Awesome Games Studio Sp. z o.o.

name: Attack like a Super Chess GM

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, it’s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Randomly generated levels keep every punishing platforming challenge fresh as you dash to save your kid.

editorialNotes.tagline: Hide and seek in the Wild West

editorialNotes.standard: This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.
